titleStmt.title: The severall accompts of Sir John Gell, Baronet and Colonell, and of his brother Thomas Gell, Esquire, Lievetenant Colonell. Published to cleare their innocency from false imputations.
titleStmt.author: Gell, John, Sir, 1593-1671.
Gell, Thomas, 1594-1656.

notesStmt.note: Wing has publication year 1644[5]; Thomason catalogue lists under 1645.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "March: 17th". Thomason catalogue lists under February 17.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
